posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content: There is no link there but just to comment on something for Arelith. In Arelith you need Four levels of a rogue/monk/bard class for skill-dumping because you need to take the first three all-together. For example in the first group the fighter(8)/ Rogue(4)/ DwD(18) is the correct choice. See some of the Arelith builds in the level-30 sub-forum to get an idea of what I am talking about.
